Text: How to Maximize the Value of Your Companys Intellectual Propertyrespond to Rick Guttroff From Rick Guttroff AMA Center for Legal Management Dear Jeffrey K Skilling In New York City next Monday and Tuesday May and you have an unprecedented opportunity to discover tangible ways to maximize the value of your companys intellectual property Learn how to Use your IP to increase stockholder value Determine the value of your IP to outside markets Assess your IP value against the costs to exploit it Handle your IP without risk of infringement Balance business priorities while preserving IP rights Turn todays IP challenges into tomorrows profits For years the American Management Association has been showing companies how to adapt to changing business environments With this conference we do it again Register today and help your company find its hidden IP wealth Call for details and to register Complex technological innovations coupled with a proliferation of intellectual property rights have brought the rich potential of IP to the forefront in corporations throughout the world Many have discovered competitive advantage in their oncehidden IP assets This seminar provides a practical framework for understanding the array of issues surrounding intellectual property and how to turn that knowledge into corporate profits Showing the way will be IP expert lawyers from New Yorks premier IP law firm Fish Neave Corporate executives come and learn Corporate executives send your inhouse lawyers The cutting edge of intellectual property law and strategy will be on display at this conference Register yourself for and bring a colleague for only Call today We look forward to seeing you at the IP Strategies to Enhance Corporate Profitability conference in New York next week Sincerely Rick Guttroff Director Center for Legal Management American Management Association PS Please forward this information to others in your company with responsibility of your IP assets You can send as many colleagues as you like for the discount registration Meeting No F Meeting Dates May Meeting Locale AMA Executive Conference Center Broadway th Floor New York NY PLEASE PROVIDE THIS INFORMATION WHEN YOU CALL TO REGISTER First Registrant at Additional Registrants at Company Address City State Zip Code Phone Email Payment Instructions Options Bill me Bill company Charge to Visa MC
